qas.question: What is an important industry in Israel?
How many tourists visited Israel in 2013?
What is the most popular tourist attraction in Israel?

context: <a0_0>Tourism<a0_0/>, especially religious tourism, is an important industry in Israel, with the country's temperate climate, beaches, archaeological, other historical and biblical sites, and unique geography also drawing tourists. Israel's security problems have taken their toll on the industry, but the number of incoming tourists is on the rebound. In 2013, a record of <a1_0>3.54 million<a1_0/> tourists visited Israel with the most popular site of attraction being the <a2_0>Western Wall<a2_0/> with 68% of tourists visiting there. Israel has the highest number of museums per capita in the world.
